SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.search

Class SecuritycurrencySearchBuilder

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.search.SecuritycurrencySearchBuilder
Direct Known Subclasses:
CurrencyPairSearchBuilder, SecuritySearchBuilder
public class SecuritycurrencySearchBuilder extends Object
Base class for building JPA Criteria API queries for securities and currency pairs.

This class provides common utility methods for creating subqueries that are used to exclude securities/currency pairs that are already present in watchlists or correlation sets. This is typically used when searching for instruments to add to these collections.

The subqueries created by this class are designed to work with NOT EXISTS clauses to filter out items that are already in the target collection.

  • Constructor Details

    • SecuritycurrencySearchBuilder

  • Method Details

    • subQueryForAddingWatchlist

      protected <T extends Securitycurrency<?>> jakarta.persistence.criteria.Subquery<Watchlist> subQueryForAddingWatchlist(Integer idWatchlist, jakarta.persistence.criteria.Root<T> security, jakarta.persistence.criteria.CriteriaQuery<?> query, jakarta.persistence.criteria.CriteriaBuilder builder)
      Creates a subquery to check if a security or currency pair exists in a specific watchlist.

      This method builds a subquery that can be used with NOT EXISTS to exclude securities/currency pairs that are already present in the specified watchlist. This is commonly used when searching for instruments to add to a watchlist.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of security/currency extending Securitycurrency
      Parameters:
      idWatchlist - the ID of the watchlist to check against
      security - the root entity in the main query (Security or Currencypair)
      query - the main criteria query
      builder - the criteria builder for constructing predicates
      Returns:
      a subquery that returns watchlists containing the specified security/currency

    • subQueryForAddingCorrelationSet

      protected <T extends Securitycurrency<?>> jakarta.persistence.criteria.Subquery<CorrelationSet> subQueryForAddingCorrelationSet(Integer idCorrelationSet, jakarta.persistence.criteria.Root<T> security, jakarta.persistence.criteria.CriteriaQuery<?> query, jakarta.persistence.criteria.CriteriaBuilder builder)
      Creates a subquery to check if a security or currency pair exists in a specific correlation set.

      This method builds a subquery that can be used with NOT EXISTS to exclude securities/currency pairs that are already present in the specified correlation set. This is commonly used when searching for instruments to add to a correlation analysis.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of security/currency extending Securitycurrency
      Parameters:
      idCorrelationSet - the ID of the correlation set to check against
      security - the root entity in the main query (Security or Currencypair)
      query - the main criteria query
      builder - the criteria builder for constructing predicates
      Returns:
      a subquery that returns correlation sets containing the specified security/currency
